text: Joseph Athanase Doumer, commonly known as Paul Doumer (; 22 March 18577 May 1932), was the President of France from 13 June 1931 until his assassination on 7 May 1932. At the age of 74, he is the oldest person elected president. ==References== Category:1857 births Category:1932 deaths Category:Assassinated French politicians Category:Murders by firearm Category:Presidents of France Category:People from Cantal Category:Politicians from Auvergne-Rh√¥ne-Alpes Category:20th-century presidents of France
title: Paul Doumer
